EmailTemplate.name: 201705_Global_Email_TechPub_Group2_mih.201705_Global_Email_TechPub_Group2_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Important News Regarding Your Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> FIND MORE ONLINE. Hello, Honeywell Aerospace has important news for you. In a continued effort to improve our online experiences, we’ve made changes to the MyAerospace <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]> portal to make it faster and easier to use. As part of this, we are updating and improving our online technical publication database. This is good news for you and every Honeywell customer. With it, we can keep important information accurate and up-to-date and more efficiently answer your questions.
We are verifying the accuracy of all customer information to make sure we are providing the best possible service. To ensure there is not an interruption in your access to technical publications, please reply directly to this email with the requested customer information below.
We will need your response no later than June 16, 2017, in order to update and verify your customer information.
Your Name
Company Name
Company Address
Phone Number
Aircraft(s) or Honeywell Products Currently Owned/Operated
Description of Business Choose the one that applies: (Owner/Operator, Service Provider, Dealer, Channel Partner, OEM, Part 145 Repair Station, Management Company, FBO, Fractional, Charter, Other)
We appreciate your help in updating this new, more efficient system. Once you’ve had the chance to use it yourself we think you’ll agree this is good news for all of us.
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team Email: Pubs@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Pubs@Honeywell.com]]> Web: http://www.myaerospace.com <[[http://www.myaerospace.com]]> Phone: 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
P.S. Don’t forget to respond by June 16, 2017. After that date we will be restricting access to only those contacts we’ve been able to verify.
